content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 39, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 11, "index": 29}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a crafting_table, I need to place 4 planks in a square shape in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move one plank from slot 42 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 39, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 11, "index": 29}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that there is a plank in slot 1, I need to move another plank to the right of it (slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 39, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 11, "index": 29}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that there are two planks in a row in the crafting grid, I need to move another plank below them (slot 4).
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 39, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 11, "index": 29}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that there are three planks in a square shape in the crafting grid, I need to move the fourth plank to the right of the bottom row (slot 5).
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 39, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 11, "index": 29}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that the crafting_table has been crafted, I need to move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
